name: 01 IT Solutions
description:
01 IT Solutions is a Chicago based IT Consulting firm which specializes in software customization and development to help businesses achieve their goals. The name of our company reflects our specialization by evoking the notion of binary computer language.
More importantly, our company provides end-to-end developmental services and IT solutions for web and mobile applications. In order to fulfill our clientsâ€™ needs, we use the most cutting-edge technologies while providing the highest level of customer service. We are built upon integrity and customer satisfaction because we understand the importance of it. We strongly believe that in every sphere that the company works in, there are a lot of ways of implementing innovations. Our mission is to be become your strategic partner by establishing trust and providing you with timely deliveries, intelligent solutions and proven results.
